title: Rolando Chuaqui
summary: Rolando Basim Chuaqui Kettlun (December 30, 1935â€“April 23, 1994[1]) was a Chilean mathematician who worked on the foundations of probabilities and foundations of mathematics. Throughout his lifetime, he published two books and over 50 journal articles in mathematics and logic.[1] He also spearheaded the creation and expansion of mathematics departments across multiple Chilean universities.
